translation.en: [boy] Fight! I gotta go see this!
translation.ja: 行くぞ　ケンカだ

translation.en: [boy 2] Hey, they're fighting! Come on!
translation.ja: ケンカだって

translation.en: No! No!
translation.ja: やめて！

translation.en: It's your third fight, and it's only the third day of school.
translation.ja: ３日で３回目のケンカだ

translation.en: She told everyone I have herpes!
translation.ja: ヘルペスがあるとウソを

translation.en: Only so I could start a GoFundMe,
translation.ja: 寄付金を集めるためよ

translation.en: which was a total bust, 'cause turns out everyone has it.
translation.ja: でも失敗皆ヘルペスがあった

translation.en: See? She's a child, and children sometimes need to be hit.
translation.ja: 彼女は子供です時には罰が必要かと

translation.en: Hey, we're not gonna hit.
translation.ja: たたくな

translation.en: -We can bite, right? -[Principal] Violence is not the answer.
translation.ja: かむのは？ 暴力はダメだ

translation.en: And, Gloria, I expect more from you. You are sophomore class president.
translation.ja: グロリア学級委員長らしくしろ

translation.en: I'm sensing some preferential treatment that borders on inappropriate.
translation.ja: それは不適切な優遇処置かと

translation.en: Does this require a call to the school board or your wife?
translation.ja: 教育委員会か奥さんに電話します？

translation.en: Gloria, biting's okay as long as you don't break the skin.
translation.ja: かんでもいいが皮は破くな

translation.en: Mr. Salazar, if you don't get your daughters in line--
translation.ja: サラザールさん娘さんのしつけを…

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll hit them so hard.
translation.ja: 大丈夫です激しく殴っておきますので

translation.en: I mean, metaphorically. I'll hit them hard with life lessons.
translation.ja: 比喩的な意味です人生の教訓として

translation.en: Good. Next time, it's expulsion.
translation.ja: そうですか次回は退学です

translation.en: You can't be home all day. I don't care that you're motherless or my nieces.
translation.ja: またこれだ 父子家庭とかめいっ子とか関係ない

translation.en: The last time I'm gonna save you fools. My fee has gone up. I'm too busy for this!
translation.ja: いい加減にしろ手数料を上げる

translation.en: Sorry we interrupted your game of Animal Crossing, Tío.
translation.ja: 「あつ森」の邪魔したね

translation.en: Appreciate it. But today's stunt is still gonna cost you each a hundy.
translation.ja: 今日の迎えには100ドルずつもらう

translation.en: You got a week to settle your debt, or I'll reroute the home phone.
translation.ja: １週間でカネを用意しなきゃ転送を止める

translation.en: Instead of coming to my cell,
translation.ja: 学校の電話は

translation.en: all calls from the school are going straight to your father.
translation.ja: 俺じゃなくて父親につながる

translation.en: Now goodbye. You can walk home.
translation.ja: じゃあな　歩いて帰れ

translation.en: As opposed to what? You don't have a car!
translation.ja: もともと車ないじゃん

translation.en: [Salazar] One week!
translation.ja: １週間だ

translation.en: This is your fault! No more!
translation.ja: あんたのせいよ

translation.en: I'm done! You can officially start taking care of yourself!
translation.ja: もう知らない自分の面倒は自分で見ろ

translation.en: Green sauce.
translation.ja: 青唐辛子

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: は？

translation.en: With enchiladas. That's what I want for dinner.
translation.ja: 夕飯はエンチラーダで

translation.en: Shit.
translation.ja: クソ

translation.en: [grunts] She's ruining my life and probably my future.
translation.ja: あいつに人生を壊される

translation.en: I'm on the cusp of getting expelled, and it's all your fault.
translation.ja: 退学寸前なのはあんたたちのせい

translation.en: -Ours? -[Gloria] Yes!
translation.ja: 俺ら？

translation.en: Where were you assholes?
translation.ja: あの場にいなかった

translation.en: You were supposed to keep me from fighting Ines.
translation.ja: だからイネスとケンカに

translation.en: You know, it doesn't matter. You couldn't have stopped me anyway.
translation.ja: でも関係ない誰にも止められなかった

translation.en: These fists were made for my sister's face.
translation.ja: この拳は妹を殴るために作られたの

translation.en: That's it. I give up.
translation.ja: もう諦める

translation.en: What God gives with both hands to some people,
translation.ja: 神は両手で人を作ったけど

translation.en: he clearly only gave with his pinkie to me.
translation.ja: 私に使ったのは小指だけ

translation.en: No, God gave you the middle finger.
translation.ja: 神はあんたに中指を立てた

translation.en: I am not gonna let my little sister ruin my reputation!
translation.ja: 妹のせいで私の評判が落ちたら困る

translation.en: Oh, Glo, your rep is already wrecked.
translation.ja: もう落ちてる

translation.en: For me and Demi, people are starting to associate her with us, and us with her!
translation.ja: 俺とデミも巻き添えを食らってる

translation.en: Take back control.
translation.ja: 名誉挽回を

translation.en: I read your horoscope, and your third house of communication is energized.
translation.ja: 星占いで人との関わりが吉と出てる

translation.en: There's never been a better time to tell Ines how you feel and break free.
translation.ja: イネスから解放されるには今しかない

translation.en: Yes, let's all break free and live like it's freshman year again,
translation.ja: 新入生みたいにやり直そう

translation.en: when Ines was in middle school and life was good.
translation.ja: 去年は順調だった

translation.en: I mean, being a sophomore is hard enough without Ines' vibes.
translation.ja: イネス抜きだと寂しいけど

translation.en: Or Andre's.
translation.ja: アンドレも

translation.en: Okay, calm your tits, missy. I'm dumping Andre. It's happening.
translation.ja: アンドレとは別れる本気だ

translation.en: I hope.
translation.ja: だろ？

translation.en: Truth talk. Ines is a black hole of negativity.
translation.ja: 正直 イネスは悪い影響しかない

translation.en: I personally could use an Ines cleanse, but you need one!
translation.ja: 特にあんたは距離を置くべき

translation.en: [boy] We all need one.
translation.ja: 仲間から外そう

translation.en: It's time! We've evolved, and she hasn't.
translation.ja: 潮時だ　彼女はまだガキ

translation.en: She's the tag-along who put dog shit in my backpack on the way to school!
translation.ja: 俺のバッグに犬のクソを入れやがった

translation.en: And gave me bangs on the back of my head!
translation.ja: 髪の毛を勝手に切られた

translation.en: And now I have herpes!
translation.ja: 私にはヘルペスと

translation.en: -Oh my God. -I don't have herpes.
translation.ja: 気の毒に ウワサだけ

translation.en: But my sister sucks, and I need boundaries.
translation.ja: 妹は最低　境界線が必要

translation.en: -Can I borrow two dollars? -Borrow? Am I gonna get it back?
translation.ja: ２ドル貸して 返してくれる？

translation.en: After I pay my tío.
translation.ja: 叔父に払ったら

translation.en: -I can't believe I'm buying Ines dinner. -[Gloria] I'm sorry.
translation.ja: イネスに夕飯を買うとは

translation.en: We owe Tío Tonio a thousand dollars.
translation.ja: 叔父に1000ドル貸しがあるの

translation.en: A thousand dollars? How are you gonna pay it?
translation.ja: 1000ドル？どうやって払うの？

translation.en: We don't accept these.
translation.ja: 使えません

translation.en: But they're silver dollars! They are worth way more than face value!
translation.ja: 銀貨だぞ数字以上の価値がある

translation.en: Have you seen the box with all my baby stuff?
translation.ja: 赤ちゃん時代の思い出の箱は？

translation.en: I'm trying to find a silver spoon Tía Maria gave me.
translation.ja: 銀スプーンがあったはず

translation.en: I could get a good chunk of change for it, with silver being so valuable these days.
translation.ja: 最近は銀が貴重だから絶対に高く売れる

translation.en: Like maybe even $150.
translation.ja: 150ドルとか

translation.en: [Ines] Mm, more like $310.
translation.ja: 310ドルよ

translation.en: Really? You think?
translation.ja: そう思う？

translation.en: -[Ines] That's what I got for it. -You sold it?
translation.ja: 私が売った 売った？

translation.en: Bitch, stop stressing. Things will work out like they always do.
translation.ja: 怒らないで今度もどうにかなる

translation.en: Things don't just magically work out!
translation.ja: どうにかならない

translation.en: They work out because I figure them out for you!
translation.ja: あんたのために私が努力してるの

translation.en: Yeah, because I have faith.
translation.ja: 姉を信じてる

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Faith is bullshit.
translation.ja: 信頼なんかクソ食らえ

translation.en: Having a plan, doing the work. That's what gets you money.
translation.ja: 自分で働いてそれが稼ぐってこと

translation.en: [man] What are you doing in here?
translation.ja: 何してる？

translation.en: And where did you get that split lip?
translation.ja: その唇のケガは誰が？

translation.en: -Demi. -Why are you still friends with her?
translation.ja: デミ なぜつるむ？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.ja: さあね

translation.en: Oh my.
translation.ja: これは…

translation.en: I was sorting through my things to sell. I wasn't gonna touch Mom's stuff.
translation.ja: 売る物を探してたママの箱には触れてない

translation.en: I gave this to your mother on our--
translation.ja: これはママへの贈り物だ

translation.en: -[all] On your third date. -[all chuckle]
translation.ja: ３回目のデートでね

translation.en: You can look through Mom's boxes too. See if there's anything to sell.
translation.ja: ママの物も見ていい何か売れるかも

translation.en: Just not this.
translation.ja: これはダメ

translation.en: Oh, and Saturday, I invited a friend to my birthday dinner.
translation.ja: 土曜日の誕生会に友人を招待した

translation.en: Oh shit!
translation.ja: マズい

translation.en: We forgot to get Dad a birthday gift.
translation.ja: プレゼントがない

translation.en: Ines, while I get ready for this sale to pay off our debt, you get Dad a gift.
translation.ja: 私が売る物を探す間パパへのプレゼントを買って

translation.en: Or you get Dad a gift, and I'll put my name on it.
translation.ja: または私からってことであんたが用意する

translation.en: [Gloria] She's done!
translation.ja: 決めた！

translation.en: While we know the toxicity's never gonna leave my family,
translation.ja: 家からは追い出せないけど

translation.en: I think I found a way for it to leave the friend group.
translation.ja: グループからは追い出せる

translation.en: I deal with Ines at home and ice her out at school.
translation.ja: 家は仕方ないけど学校では無視する

translation.en: What are we celebrating?
translation.ja: 何のお祝い？

translation.en: -Do it! -[boy] It's easy.
translation.ja: やって 簡単だろ

translation.en: Do it!
translation.ja: やれよ

translation.en: Hey!
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: There's my complicated ray of light,
translation.ja: 僕の複雑な光

translation.en: like sunshine peeking through a lot of grumpy clouds.
translation.ja: 不機嫌な雲からのぞく太陽光

translation.en: I haven't seen you since second period.
translation.ja: ２時限目ぶりだね

translation.en: Mm, I miss your smell.
translation.ja: この匂い

translation.en: You first. Do it.
translation.ja: あんたからよ

translation.en: No, no, no, ladies first.
translation.ja: 女性が先だ

translation.en: Someone go first. This is annoying.
translation.ja: 誰でもいいから早く

translation.en: Yeah. Okay. I just wanna say I need to…
translation.ja: 分かった俺が言いたいのは…

translation.en: Shit!
translation.ja: クソッ

translation.en: I'll come with. I have Poo-Pourri!
translation.ja: 僕もトイレに

translation.en: And I gotta practice my double-arm hang. Getting timed for the record this week.
translation.ja: 私は懸垂の練習しなくちゃ今週は新記録を出す

translation.en: Is it just me, or does it feel like
translation.ja: ねえ 思わない？

translation.en: this friend group needs to be smaller, more intimate?
translation.ja: このグループ人数が多すぎ

translation.en: Yeah, one of us definitely isn't honoring their purpose.
translation.ja: ええ ある人物は仲間を尊重してない

translation.en: How are we gonna tell Cam he's out?
translation.ja: キャムに伝える？

translation.en: [Demi] Bitch has got to go.
translation.ja: あいつを追い出す

translation.en: We have to tell her, since Gloria never will.
translation.ja: 私たちが伝えないと

translation.en: I've never been more attracted to you.
translation.ja: 頼もしい君に引かれる

translation.en: Cam, stop.
translation.ja: やめて　キャム

translation.en: You're in a relationship, and we're friends.
translation.ja: 彼氏がいるでしょ私たちは友達

translation.en: Your new fixation on me is just an excuse
translation.ja: あんたは言い訳が欲しいだけ

translation.en: to avoid your feelings, or lack of them, for Andre.
translation.ja: アンドレへの気持ちから逃げてる

translation.en: Reminder, you don't do guilt well.
translation.ja: あんたの悪い癖

translation.en: Maybe I should be alone.
translation.ja: 一人がいい？

translation.en: Alone would be good for you.
translation.ja: それがいいかもね

translation.en: But it's depressing. You know, I love love.
translation.ja: でも落ち込む愛を愛してるんだ

translation.en: I just…
translation.ja: 俺はただ…

translation.en: Don't love people. Yeah.
translation.ja: 人を愛せないだけ そう

translation.en: You know, I'm coming to realize there are few people I can even tolerate,
translation.ja: 気を許せる友人はそう多くない

translation.en: which is why I was feeling like I might be feeling you.
translation.ja: だから君に気がある気がする

translation.en: Makes sense, and I'm honored, but this is just a part of your pattern.
translation.ja: うれしいけど毎回 同じことの繰り返し

translation.en: You need a new obsession to justify ditching the old one,
translation.ja: 過去を捨てるための新しい恋

translation.en: but maybe you shouldn't ditch. Maybe stick it out, break your pattern.
translation.ja: 捨てない方がいいのかもルールを破って

translation.en: Plus, you know I don't bone or home wreck. I'm not a Gemini.
translation.ja: それに私は浮気や性交渉もしない

translation.en: And I won't be comfortable destroying the friend group
translation.ja: 別れたらグループも崩壊

translation.en: when we definitely have a bad breakup.
translation.ja: 気まずくなる

translation.en: So we aren't gonna destroy it. We're just gonna trim it down by one.
translation.ja: だからグループが壊れる前に一人を消すの

translation.en: One Ines.
translation.ja: イネス

translation.en: Two.
translation.ja: ２人だ

translation.en: Andre's bye-bye. I'm ready to cut bait.
translation.ja: アンドレとは別れる

translation.en: Thank you for your rationalization and rejection.
translation.ja: 合理的な判断と拒絶に感謝する

translation.en: I actually like the idea of me rolling solo.
translation.ja: 一人になるのはいい案だ

translation.en: You know, wearing a cozy, soft gray cardigan.
translation.ja: グレーのカーディガンを着てね

translation.en: No pockets!
translation.ja: ポケットはなし

translation.en: See? This is why I've secretly been obsessed with you.
translation.ja: だから密かに君に引かれてた

translation.en: Liar, you have no secrets.
translation.ja: 秘密はないでしょ

translation.en: I do. Just never told you for the obvious reason.
translation.ja: あるよ　理由があって言ってないだけ

translation.en: Which is…
translation.ja: 理由って？

translation.en: You'd wreck me.
translation.ja: 本気だから

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Icing you out.
translation.ja: これは？ 無視してる

translation.en: -Time for you to find your own friends. -Why? Your friends are my friends.
translation.ja: もう仲間じゃない あんたの仲間は私の仲間

translation.en: No, my friends are my friends.
translation.ja: 私の仲間は 私のもの

translation.en: Okay, that makes sense, but I don't have any of my own friends.
translation.ja: そうだけど私は自分の友達がいない

translation.en: -I'm closing my door now. -Wait!
translation.ja: 閉めるね 待って

translation.en: I did it! I told her she's out!
translation.ja: 言ってやった仲間じゃないって

translation.en: -And she just took it? -Yep!
translation.ja: 理解した？ ええ

translation.en: [Demi] Okay, good! -I can delete her email. -What email?
translation.ja: じゃあメールを削除する

translation.en: The anonymous one, telling her to eat shit.
translation.ja: 匿名で嫌がらせを

translation.en: Send it!
translation.ja: 送って

translation.en: No, don't. Just delete it. We're done.
translation.ja: やっぱりなし　もう解決した

translation.en: [Cam] You said you were done.
translation.ja: 解決した？

translation.en: -[chuckles] Yeah. -What happened to having boundaries?
translation.ja: うん 境界線は？

translation.en: I extended the border. I gotta use her before I lose her.
translation.ja: 少し延ばしたの 捨てる前に利用する

translation.en: Watch. Ines!
translation.ja: 見てて　イネス

translation.en: Those shirts aren't gonna fold themselves.
translation.ja: へそが隠れてないよ

translation.en: You see? She's my bitch.
translation.ja: 見た？　操ってるの

translation.en: Oh, okay. Customer coming. Go, go, go.
translation.ja: 客が来た　行って

translation.en: Hi!
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: I couldn't help but notice that you're having a yard sale.
translation.ja: ヤードセール中だとは聞いてないな

translation.en: Right next to my yard sale.
translation.ja: 僕の営業の隣で

translation.en: Oopsie.
translation.ja: どうする？

translation.en: So, are they leaving?
translation.ja: 注意してくれた？

translation.en: Did you just buy a record?
translation.ja: レコード買ったの？

translation.en: She said it was a collectible.
translation.ja: 価値のある品だって

translation.en: Shoo! You gotta go!
translation.ja: あっちへ行って

translation.en: Excuse me. How much for this?
translation.ja: これ いくら？

translation.en: One for six or two for ten.
translation.ja: ２つで10ドル

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Okay. You can stay.
translation.ja: 残っていいわ

translation.en: I'd be happy to.
translation.ja: 喜んで

translation.en: I'll even upsell your crap for 50% of the sales.
translation.ja: 売上の50％をくれればもっと売ります

translation.en: Deal.
translation.ja: 交渉成立 交渉成立 〝料金支払い所〞

translation.en: First five sales go to the house.
translation.ja: 〝料金支払い所〞 この５ドルは賃貸料

translation.en: Sheesh.
translation.ja: クソ

translation.en: Found Andre a gift.
translation.ja: これはアンドレに

translation.en: -But MM aren't his initials. -Exactly.
translation.ja: イニシャルが違う だからさ

translation.en: Wrong initials, a box. It's perfect.
translation.ja: 完璧なプレゼントだろ

translation.en: He's gonna dump me after I give him this,
translation.ja: 怒って俺と別れる

translation.en: especially when he keeps harping on how thoughtless I am.
translation.ja: 思いやりのない贈り物が嫌いなんだ

translation.en: -Two bucks. -Which is exactly how much you owe me.
translation.ja: ２ドル 丁度 貸した金額だ

translation.en: So transaction complete.
translation.ja: これで貸しはチャラ

translation.en: I'm looking for a monogrammed box.
translation.ja: 文字の書かれた箱を見た？

translation.en: -Did it have the initials MM on it? -[woman] Yes.
translation.ja: ＭＭと書かれた箱？ そう

translation.en: Oh, I haven't seen it.
translation.ja: 見てない

translation.en: [woman] Seen it now?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: It's [clears throat] sounding vaguely familiar.
translation.ja: よく考えたら見たことあるかも

translation.en: [woman] $200.
translation.ja: 200ドル出すわ

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.ja: 失礼

translation.en: -I'll give you four bucks for the box. -No.
translation.ja: ４ドル出すから返して

translation.en: That's double what you paid.
translation.ja: ２倍だよ？

translation.en: My freedom from Andre is worth more than money.
translation.ja: 自由はカネで買えない

translation.en: All right. There is a lady willing to pay 200 for it.
translation.ja: ある女性が200ドルで買うって

translation.en: Where's the lady?
translation.ja: どの人？

translation.en: She was right there.
translation.ja: そこにいたのに

translation.en: [Gloria] Trash. Trash.
translation.ja: ゴミ…　ゴミ…

translation.en: Trash!
translation.ja: これも！

translation.en: It's the lady from the yard sale when she was young.
translation.ja: 彼女の若い頃の写真だ

translation.en: Must be why she wanted the box. It's hers.
translation.ja: 自分の持ち物だったんだ

translation.en: Glo! No!
translation.ja: ちょっと！

translation.en: Photos are sacred.
translation.ja: 写真は神聖よ

translation.en: -What did you get Dad? -This cute top. Dad loves yellow on me.
translation.ja: パパのプレゼントは？ この服　可愛い娘付き

translation.en: Thank you for being so reliably unreliable. Now go away.
translation.ja: すごく頼りになる妹ねあっちへ行って

translation.en: Happy birthday, Dad. Pocket knife it is.
translation.ja: プレゼントはナイフかな

translation.en: [Cam sighs] I gotta go.
translation.ja: 行かなきゃ

translation.en: -Why are you going out the back? -Andre's tracking my phone.
translation.ja: 裏口から？ 携帯を追跡されてる

translation.en: I know 'cause I'm tracking his, but only 'cause he's tracking mine!
translation.ja: 俺も追跡してるでもアンドレが先だ

translation.en: -Yeah. He's out front. Back door calls. -I better go too. I'll see ya.
translation.ja: 表にいるみたい 私も帰る　またね

translation.en: [woman] $500.
translation.ja: 500ドルでどう？

translation.en: Gloria!
translation.ja: グロリア

translation.en: [woman] $600!
Okay, I would love to take your money, but I don't have the box!
translation.ja: そのお金は欲しいけど箱を持ってないの

translation.en: -[woman] Your friend does. He brought it. -Oh, you followed us home.
translation.ja: 友達が持ってる 私たちを追いかけて来たのね

translation.en: That's very persistent, but it doesn't change the fact that I don't have what you're looking for.
translation.ja: 粘り強さには感心するけど箱は私の物じゃない

translation.en: That box is cursed.
translation.ja: 呪われた箱なの

translation.en: Yikes. But still, I don't have it.
translation.ja: でも私の物じゃない
1000ドルならどう？

translation.en: [chuckles] Excuse me! Just one second.
translation.ja: 失礼　ちょっと待ってて

translation.en: Don't sell.
translation.ja: 売るな

translation.en: If this lady's willing to pay you $1,000, then she knows something we don't.
translation.ja: 1000ドル払う理由を教えてくれない

translation.en: That box has to be worth way more than what she's offering.
translation.ja: きっとそれ以上の価値がある

translation.en: Move over. Let the pro handle this.
translation.ja: プロに任せておけ

translation.en: Since we're family, I'll only charge a 50% negotiation fee.
translation.ja: 交渉料は50％だけもらう

translation.en: 30%. Final offer!
translation.ja: 30％　これが限界

translation.en: -25%. Final offer! -12.5%.
Deal!
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: [Demi] We're cursed!
translation.ja: 呪われた

translation.en: [Gloria] We're not.
translation.ja: あり得ない

translation.en: But we took things from the box. We all touched it.
translation.ja: 箱の中身に触ったでしょ

translation.en: We're all part of it now. We have taken the darkness in.
translation.ja: 全員 闇の世界に足を踏み入れた

translation.en: -We need to reverse the curse. -Or what?
translation.ja: 呪いを解くの 何の呪い？

translation.en: Don't know! Every curse has its own rules!
translation.ja: さあね呪いにはルールがある

translation.en: I call bullshit. Curses aren't real.
translation.ja: 呪いなんて存在しない

translation.en: What if they are? We need to get the box and sell it.
translation.ja: 本当なら？箱を売らなきゃ

translation.en: No! We can't sell it. We don't know if we need it yet.
translation.ja: ダメだよ売るべきか分からない

translation.en: We need more info on the curse. That's rule number one.
translation.ja: ルールその１　情報収集

translation.en: Of what?
translation.ja: 何のルール？

translation.en: Basic curse knowledge.
translation.ja: 呪いの基礎知識

translation.en: We have to go to the place of origin, the yard sale,
translation.ja: 発見地である家に行く

translation.en: and find out where the box came from. We have to go now!
translation.ja: 箱の起源を調べなきゃ今すぐ！

translation.en: It's my dad's birthday, and we're about to have dinner!
translation.ja: パパの誕生日だよ　夕食は？

translation.en: Dinner? Dinner is more important than undoing a lethal spell?
translation.ja: 夕食？夕食が死の呪いより大切？

translation.en: You think it's lethal?
translation.ja: 死の呪い？

translation.en: Now's not the time to debate this nonsense. Let's put a pin in it.
translation.ja: 今する話じゃないあとで話そう

translation.en: Or a nail in our coffin, because if we don't move quickly, we're all gonna die!
translation.ja: そうだね棺桶の中でゆっくり話そうか

translation.en: Okay! If we're gonna die, can you please perish in your own home?
translation.ja: もし死ぬなら自分の家で死んでくれる？

translation.en: -Hey, girls. -[man] Hi, Mr. Salazar!
translation.ja: やあ　みんな サラザールさん

translation.en: Demi.
translation.ja: デミか

translation.en: I don't get you girls. Why is she still your friend?
translation.ja: なぜ いまだに友達なんだ？

translation.en: Dad, your friend's here! What's his name?
translation.ja: 友達が来たよ　名前は？

translation.en: Lucia!
translation.ja: ルシアだ

translation.en: Is it warm in here?
translation.ja: 暑くない？

translation.en: I'll turn the air on.
translation.ja: エアコンを

translation.en: [dad] Girls, talk. You're being rude.
translation.ja: 話しなさい　失礼だ

translation.en: So, what do you do?
translation.ja: それで？　仕事は？

translation.en: I'm a lawyer.
translation.ja: 弁護士よ

translation.en: So you like money.
translation.ja: 稼ぐんだね

translation.en: Uh, most of my work is pro bono.
translation.ja: 奉仕活動がほとんど

translation.en: -[phone chimes] -[dad] Uh, Lucia volunteers at our church.
translation.ja: 〝貧乏な負け犬〞 教会でも奉仕活動を

translation.en: Our church? We don't go to church.
translation.ja: 私たちは教会に行かない

translation.en: Well, maybe we'll start going again.
translation.ja: また行こうと思ってるよ

translation.en: We have to go to church?
translation.ja: 教会に行くの？

translation.en: Hi, I'm Tonio.
translation.ja: やあ　トニオだ

translation.en: See you around.
translation.ja: またね

translation.en: Or not. [laughs]
translation.ja: ウソだよ

translation.en: Jeez. I'm just reading their faces. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 表情を読んだだけだ

translation.en: Night, bitches!
translation.ja: じゃあな

translation.en: PS, the knife is from all of us. Dile.
translation.ja: ナイフは全員からのプレゼント

translation.en: -Did he just go into the pantry? -That's his room.
translation.ja: パントリーに入って行った 彼の部屋なの

translation.en: Dad, happy birthday.
translation.ja: パパ　誕生日おめでとう

translation.en: Oh, thank you! [chuckles]
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Oh! Oh, oh, oh, oh, that's sharp! Ow!
translation.ja: 痛っ！　鋭いナイフだ

translation.en: Excuse me. Uh, let me get a tourniquet.
translation.ja: 失礼　止血しなきゃ

translation.en: -Oh, honey! -[mouthing] Honey?
translation.ja: ハニー “ハニー？”

translation.en: Oh, it's not a big deal. I just, uh… I tweaked my back.
translation.ja: 問題ない背中をひねっただけ

translation.en: [Gloria] I'll get you a Band-Aid. You should probably lie down.
translation.ja: 私が止血を 横になって

translation.en: Alone!
translation.ja: 一人で！

translation.en: Right. Okay.
translation.ja: 一人でね　了解

translation.en: [exhales] Am I overreacting, or are we really in danger?
translation.ja: 私は大げさ？または本当に危険が？

translation.en: Spirit guides, give me a sign if we're damned.
translation.ja: 守護霊よ　呪いならサインを

translation.en: Shit.
translation.ja: マジか

translation.en: Do-over.
translation.ja: もう一回

translation.en: -Shit! -[knocking]
translation.ja: ウソ

translation.en: -You know I have a front door! -Yeah, too risky.
translation.ja: 玄関から入って 危険だ

translation.en: Andre's close by, per my phone.
translation.ja: アンドレが近くにいる

translation.en: Hold up. Sage, crystals, cards… What's up?
translation.ja: セージに水晶にカード？一体何事だ？

translation.en: I asked my spirit guides about the presence of evil,
translation.ja: 守護霊に悪の存在を聞いてるの

translation.en: and it doesn't look good.
translation.ja: 結果は良くない

translation.en: It doesn't. I got your text about the box. It's definitely cursed.
translation.ja: だよな　メッセージを見た絶対に呪いだ

translation.en: It is? How do you know?
translation.ja: 何か起きたの？

translation.en: Because I gave Andre the box, and--
translation.ja: 箱を渡したら…

translation.en: Oh my God. What happened to Andre?
translation.ja: どうなったの？

translation.en: He loved it. Now he's never gonna let me go.
translation.ja: 気に入ったんだ別れられない

translation.en: It's happening. It's starting. Cameron, I have a really bad feeling about this.
translation.ja: やっぱりねすごく嫌な予感がする

translation.en: We need to…
translation.ja: 私たち…

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: …get the box back!
translation.ja: 箱を返さなきゃ

translation.en: [Gloria] Ines.
translation.ja: イネス

translation.en: Go to your bed.
translation.ja: ベッドに戻って

translation.en: You're right. There's no curse.
translation.ja: 確かに 呪いは存在しない

translation.en: Dad's back is probably just jacked from all the kinky sex.
translation.ja: パパの背中は変態プレイのせい

translation.en: -You think they're having sex? -It's been a long time for him.
translation.ja: セックス？ 久しぶりの相手よ

translation.en: So maybe this is good for him.
translation.ja: いいことかもね

translation.en: And me. Now Dad won't spend so much time focused on his favorite. [sighs]
translation.ja: 私にも好都合パパに構われない

translation.en: Must be nice to be annoyed by his attention.
translation.ja: パパの注目を浴びるのは大変だよね

translation.en: It's all I want, and now I'm in third place.
translation.ja: 私は３番目だけど

translation.en: Fourth. He focuses on Tío Tonio a little more than you.
translation.ja: ４番目よ　叔父さんが３番

translation.en: -Why'd he give her Mom's scarf? -I know.
translation.ja: なぜママのスカーフを？

translation.en: Who would take a dead woman's scarf?
translation.ja: しかも死んだ元妻の

translation.en: Unless it's just like a really freaking sweet gesture and symbol of a love that turned out so well.
translation.ja: ママと同じようにいい関係を築きたいのかな

translation.en: Did it?
translation.ja: いい関係？

translation.en: Mom's dead.
translation.ja: ママは死んだ

translation.en: She died.
translation.ja: 死んだ

translation.en: She can keep the scarf.
translation.ja: あげて正解

translation.en: See? Even you think the bad juju's real.
translation.ja: ほらやっぱり呪いを信じてる

translation.en: [Gloria] No, I don't.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: If there's a curse, then that means there's a cause and effect to everything.
translation.ja: 呪いがあるとすれば悪いことの報いってこと

translation.en: And if that's true, what did Mom do to deserve to die?
translation.ja: ママは悪いことをした？

translation.en: She didn't deserve to die,
translation.ja: してないでしょ

translation.en: and I didn't deserve to lose her.
translation.ja: 私だってそう

translation.en: Bad things just happen.
translation.ja: 不運なだけ

translation.en: Go to bed.
translation.ja: 寝よう

translation.en: We gotta move before things get worse
translation.ja: 何か手を打とう

translation.en: and your dad's new lady gets pregnant with a devil baby.
translation.ja: 継母が悪魔の子を産むよ

translation.en: We're not going to hell!
translation.ja: 呪いはない

translation.en: Thank you. Team Rational is back.
translation.ja: 仲間が来て助かった

translation.en: -Ah, what's with the one-eighty? -Andre.
translation.ja: 何かあったの？ アンドレだ

translation.en: He hasn't called or texted in 16 hours, which is a record by fifteen and a half.
translation.ja: 16時間 電話もメールもない新記録だ

translation.en: You know why you haven't heard from him? 'Cause he's probably dead.
translation.ja: 彼から連絡がないのは死んだから

translation.en: Your rock broke.
translation.ja: 壊れちゃった

translation.en: This is impossible.
translation.ja: あり得ない

translation.en: It's black obsidian. It's for protection.
translation.ja: 魔除けの黒曜石なのに

translation.en: And it's one of the strongest crystals there is!
translation.ja: 水晶の中でも特に硬いの

translation.en: There's no way. This… This has to be--
translation.ja: これはお告げよ…

translation.en: -But black magic is nonsense! -Agreed.
translation.ja: 呪いなんてない 同感

translation.en: [Andre] Hey!
translation.ja: みんな～！

translation.en: You guys are being crazy.
translation.ja: 皆おかしいよ

translation.en: Andre must have used a new product
translation.ja: アンドレは新商品か―

translation.en: or a DIY chemical peel he doesn't wanna tell you about.
translation.ja: 自作のピーリングを試しただけ

translation.en: He said he did nothing out of the ordinary.
translation.ja: 何もしてないと言った

translation.en: There is some rational explanation for what happened.
translation.ja: どうとでも説明がつく

translation.en: It's called a curse.
translation.ja: それが呪い

translation.en: Because when some random old lady shows up at your door and tells you it's a curse, it's a curse!
translation.ja: 知らない老婆が現れて呪いと言うなら呪いよ

translation.en: -Or-- -No refunds!
translation.ja: いや… 返品お断り

translation.en: None wanted. We just want info on this box that we purchased at your yard sale.
translation.ja: ヤードセールで買った箱の詳細を知りたいだけ

translation.en: We think it might belong to this lady. Her picture was in the box.
translation.ja: この女性の持ち物だと思う

translation.en: [Gloria] And she was looking for it.
translation.ja: 彼女が探しに来た

translation.en: This woman? This woman was looking for that box?
translation.ja: この女性が箱を探してた？

translation.en: -She even showed up at our house. -Okay, what do you really want?
translation.ja: 家にまで来た 何が望みなの？

translation.en: -What's your game? -There's no game. We just wanna find her.
translation.ja: 遊び？ 彼女を見つけたいだけ

translation.en: Do you know her?
translation.ja: 知り合い？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
translation.ja: 彼女は―

translation.en: She's dead.
translation.ja: 死んでる

translation.en: I know I said the woman in the photo was the one looking for the box,
translation.ja: 写真の女性が来たと言ったけど

translation.en: but obviously, I was mistaken,
translation.ja: 間違いだった

translation.en: which happens, 'cause, not to be ageist, but all old people do look alike.
translation.ja: 年齢差別じゃないけど老人は皆 似てる

translation.en: We saw her. She was alive. What's it gonna take to convince you?
translation.ja: 皆 彼女を見た何を見たら信じる？

translation.en: [Cam] Andre's face!
translation.ja: アンドレの顔？

translation.en: If that's not straight out of hell, I don't know what is!
translation.ja: あれが呪いじゃなきゃ何を信じる？

translation.en: Ines, back me up. Ooky spooky doesn't exist.
translation.ja: イネス　味方でしょ？あり得ないって言って

translation.en: I don't know, Glo.
translation.ja: 分かんない

translation.en: It appears that we're not only damned, but we're also haunted.
translation.ja: 呪いだけじゃなく幽霊も出た

translation.en: That dead lady wants her box back.
translation.ja: 箱が欲しい幽霊が

translation.en: That's three for Team Ooky Spooky!
translation.ja: 呪いを信じる３人組

translation.en: You've got to be kidding me!
translation.ja: 皆して冗談でしょ

translation.en: For days, you've implored me to lose Ines, and now you back her up?
translation.ja: イネスを仲間外れにしようとしてたのに

translation.en: You know what? Maybe there is a curse.
translation.ja: 確かに呪われてるかも

translation.en: But if there is, it didn't start the day we found the box.
translation.ja: でも箱を見つけた日からじゃない

translation.en: It started the day I got stuck taking care of you!
translation.ja: あんたを世話した日からだよ

translation.en: I'm out.
translation.ja: 私は抜ける

translation.en: [Demi] You can't be out! We have to stick together to break the black magic!
translation.ja: ダメだよ一緒に呪いを解かないと

translation.en: Yeah, since the three of you are suddenly so close,
translation.ja: 私抜きでも３人で解けるでしょ

translation.en: you don't need my help to handle this almighty scourge
translation.ja: 私抜きでも３人で解けるでしょ 石を壊したり顔を腫らす呪いをね

translation.en: that breaks rocks and makes people puffy.
translation.ja: 石を壊したり顔を腫らす呪いをね

translation.en: Call me when it's life or death.
translation.ja: 死にそうなら呼んで

translation.en: -Where's your sister? -Don't know. Don't care.
translation.ja: 妹は？ どうでもいい

translation.en: Where's my… [in Spanish] money?
translation.ja: 借金は？

translation.en: [in English] Unknown caller.
translation.ja: 非通知だ

translation.en: Last time I got one of these, it was old Principal Richardson.
translation.ja: 前回出た時は校長からだった

translation.en: Okay, well, I'll just turn off call forwarding,
translation.ja: 転送をオフにして

translation.en: and whoever it is can just leave your dad a message.
translation.ja: 父親へ留守電を残してもらおう

translation.en: No, answer it!
translation.ja: 出て

translation.en: -An extra $100. -Twenty!
translation.ja: 100上乗せ 20ドル

translation.en: -Sixty! -Fifteen.
Fine!
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: [deep voice] Hello, this is Javier.
translation.ja: ハビエルです

translation.en: I understand.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: [normal voice] I understand.
translation.ja: そうですか…

translation.en: Can you spell that?
translation.ja: つづりは？

translation.en: Okay, thank you.
translation.ja: 分かりました

translation.en: Who was that?
translation.ja: 誰から？

translation.en: Some, uh, auto warranty salesperson.
translation.ja: あれだよ…飛び込みの営業電話だ

translation.en: I promise you'll have your money. I just need a little more time.
translation.ja: 時間はかかるけどお金は必ず返す

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it. We're even.
translation.ja: もう気にするな借金はなしだ

translation.en: [Gloria] I don't wanna talk to you, but I have to
translation.ja: 絶交したけど話す

translation.en: because you're good at ethically questionable things.
translation.ja: あんたは悪事に詳しいから

translation.en: We need to break into Tío Tonio's laptop. He's in the shower. No time to explain.
translation.ja: 叔父さんのパソコンをのぞく説明する暇はない

translation.en: Fine. He took a call earlier and was super weird about it.
translation.ja: さっき電話に出て変な会話をしてたの

translation.en: -He said we don't owe him money anymore. -Isn't that good?
translation.ja: カネは要らないって いいじゃん

translation.en: Ines, something is going on.
translation.ja: 何かがおかしいよ

translation.en: And like all his other secrets, the answer lies in his search history.
translation.ja: いつでも秘密の答えは検索履歴の中に

translation.en: Should we be touching this with our bare hands?
translation.ja: 手袋するべき？

translation.en: -You're worried about fingerprints? -No! Sperm!
translation.ja: 指紋？ 違う　精子

translation.en: Do you remember his password?
translation.ja: パスワード覚えてる？

translation.en: [Tonio] I'm sorry I didn't tell you.
translation.ja: 黙っててごめん

translation.en: No, we're sorry, Tío.
translation.ja: 気の毒に　叔父さん

translation.en: -I can't believe you have cancer. -I don't.
translation.ja: ガンだなんて 俺じゃない

translation.en: -Your dad does. -What?
translation.ja: ハビエルだ え？

translation.en: That call, it was about your dad.
translation.ja: 君たちの父親だ

translation.en: How long has he known?
translation.ja: パパは知ってる？

translation.en: He doesn't. That was the call to tell him.
translation.ja: いや 彼宛ての電話だった

translation.en: He just went in for his back the morning after his birthday.
translation.ja: 背中の件で病院に行って

translation.en: He told me he had an MRI--
translation.ja: ＭＲＩをして…

translation.en: So this happened after his birthday?
translation.ja: ガンが分かったのは誕生日の後？

translation.en: After we gave him the knife from the box.
translation.ja: 箱のナイフを渡した後だ

translation.en: [Tonio] I need to go lie down.
translation.ja: 横になるよ

translation.en: I said life or death.
translation.ja: 死の話をしたから

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: ねえ

translation.en: This is not your fault. We're gonna reverse it.
translation.ja: あんたのせいじゃない呪いを解こう

translation.en: [Gloria] But what if we don't?
translation.ja: 解けなかったら？

translation.en: This isn't some money we owe Tío. This is Dad.
translation.ja: 借金の話じゃないパパの話だよ

translation.en: -You know why Dad doesn't think about you? -Oh, come on, Ines. Not now.
translation.ja: ４番の理由を？ 今する話？

translation.en: It's not because you're not his favorite.
translation.ja: パパのお気に入りだから

translation.en: -It's because you are. -It's not true. He doesn't think about me.
translation.ja: 本当よ パパは私のことを気にしてない

translation.en: Because he doesn't have to. He trusts you.
translation.ja: 信頼してるから気にする必要がない

translation.en: -He knows you have it all figured out-- -I'm not gonna figure this out!
translation.ja: 何とかできる 何とかできるわけない

translation.en: [Ines] Bullshit.
translation.ja: できるよ

translation.en: [whispers] Come here.
translation.ja: 来て

translation.en: I'm sorry I said that thing about you earlier.
translation.ja: 前に言ったことは謝る

translation.en: That was just the heat of the moment.
translation.ja: カッとなったの

translation.en: No, it wasn't.
translation.ja: 本心でしょ

translation.en: You think it's a secret you all find me annoying?
translation.ja: ウザいと思ってるのバレバレ

translation.en: I may be an asshole, but I'm not dumb.
translation.ja: 私は性悪だけどバカじゃない

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: Me too.
translation.ja: 私も

translation.en: I don't just love you, Gloria.
translation.ja: 家族以上の存在よ

translation.en: I like you.
translation.ja: 憧れてる

translation.en: So
translation.ja: 頑張ったから距離を置いてあげる

translation.en: I'll give you the space that you deserve and find my own friends.
translation.ja: 頑張ったから距離を置いてあげる 友達も自分で探す

translation.en: It's time. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 大人になる

translation.en: I have an announcement.
translation.ja: 報告がある

translation.en: -Where are you going? -Snacks.
translation.ja: どこ行くの？ お菓子

translation.en: -Can we please cut her now? -No!
translation.ja: ほっとけよ ダメ

translation.en: -Why? -Because she's fearless.
translation.ja: なんで？ 彼女が必要なの

translation.en: And if we're gonna take on evil,
translation.ja: 呪いと戦うなら

translation.en: we need someone to fearlessly lead the way.
translation.ja: 勇敢に立ち向かう人が必要

translation.en: Or to potentially sacrifice.
translation.ja: もしくは犠牲者

translation.en: -So you believe? -[Ines] She does.
translation.ja: じゃあ 信じたの？ ええ

translation.en: It's a curse that we're gonna reverse.
translation.ja: 私たちで この呪いを解き―

translation.en: We're gonna save my dad.
translation.ja: パパを救うの

translation.en: -Okay, I have a plan. -Look, I have a plan.
translation.ja: ねえ 計画がある 私にも

translation.en: -Okay, no, I have a plan. -No, but I know someone…
translation.ja: 私の計画が先 私にも計画が…
